algorithm.name: AZUREREAD
algorithm.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform optical character recognition using the Azure Read API.

properties.name: ACS_URL
properties.description: URL for the Azure Cognitive Services Endpoint.

properties.name: LANGUAGE
properties.description: When provided, this disables automatic language detection. The BCP-47 language code of the text to be detected in the image. This value is case-sensitive.

properties.name: MERGE_LINES
properties.description: Whether or not to combine detected lines into a single detection. When true, all lines within a given page will be combined into one detection output with a newline in between each output. Enabling this property can avoid an excessive number of detections.

properties.name: MAX_GET_READ_RESULT_ATTEMPTS
properties.description: Maximum number of GET requests to retrieve read detection results. When set to 0 or below, allow unlimited retries until server finishes processing.

properties.name: PASS_FEED_FORWARD_TEXT_TRACKS
properties.description: When set to true, any feed-forward track with an existing TEXT property skips component processing and is passed along to the next sub-job.

actions.name: AZURE READ DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection.

actions.name: AZURE READ DETECTION ACTION (WITH LINE MERGING)
actions.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection with merged line outputs.

actions.name: AZURE READ DETECTION FF SKIP TEXT TRACKS ACTION
actions.description: Performs Azure Read API OCR detection with feed forwarding, skips TEXT tracks.

tasks.name: AZURE READ DETECTION TASK
tasks.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection.

tasks.name: AZURE READ DETECTION TASK (WITH LINE MERGING)
tasks.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection with merged line outputs.
actions: AZURE READ DETECTION ACTION (WITH LINE MERGING)

tasks.name: AZURE READ DETECTION FF SKIP TEXT TRACKS TASK
tasks.description: Performs Azure Read API OCR detection with feed forwarding, skips TEXT tracks.
actions: AZURE READ DETECTION FF SKIP TEXT TRACKS ACTION

pipelines.name: AZURE READ DETECTION PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection.

pipelines.name: AZURE READ DETECTION (WITH MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection and performs markup.

pipelines.name: AZURE READ DETECTION PIPELINE (WITH LINE MERGING)
pipelines.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection with merged line outputs.
tasks: AZURE READ DETECTION TASK (WITH LINE MERGING)

pipelines.name: AZURE READ DETECTION (WITH MARKUP AND LINE MERGING) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform Read API OCR detection and performs markup with merged line outputs.
tasks: AZURE READ DETECTION TASK (WITH LINE MERGING)
